pkgmetadata.longdescription: Exponential Factor Copula Model // Implements the exponential Factor Copula Model (eFCM) of Castro-Camilo, D. and Huser, R. (2020) for spatial extremes, with tools for dependence estimation, tail inference, and visualization. The package supports likelihood-based inference, Gaussian process modeling via Matrn covariance functions, and bootstrap uncertainty quantification. See Castro-Camilo and Huser (2020) doi:10.1080/01621459.2019.1647842.
